message: "Fighting Against Trafficking, the Epik Project and Ride My Road came together to set up the ride. The organizations host events all over the country to bring awareness to what they call modern-day slavery."

data.description: STURGIS, S.D. — Several organizations came together Wednesday to raise awareness and encourage others to fight human trafficking at the “FAST Ride” in Sturgis. FAST stands for “fighting against sex trafficking.” It’s estimated that 100,000 individuals are trafficked each year in the U.S....
data.title: Advocates come together for motorcycle ride against human trafficking - KNBN NewsCenter1
